casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy McNEILL. No. 615A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2004. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the fourth motion filed on the 14th day of June 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare the Transcript Nunc Pro Tunc:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 7th day of May 2004 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2004."
